download.description: Say goodbye to paper ledgers and spreadsheets! Our digital loan management system brings your financial tracking into the modern era. Simple, secure, and always accessible through your web browser.

hero.title: We made it easy
hero.subtitle: Transform your loan tracking from messy paperwork into a streamlined digital experience. Perfect for businesses, lenders, and anyone managing multiple loans.
hero.text: Transform your loan tracking from messy paperwork into a streamlined digital experience. Perfect for businesses, lenders, and anyone managing multiple loans.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Personalize your account and manage preferences
settings.saveError: Failed to save settings. Please try again.
settings.privacyDesc: Learn how we handle your data
settings.deleteDesc: Permanently delete your account and data
settings.deleteWarning: This action cannot be undone. Please be certain.
settings.deleteEffects: What happens when you delete your account:
settings.deleteEffect1: All your loan records will be permanently deleted
settings.deleteEffect2: Your profile and settings will be removed
settings.deleteEffect3: You'll lose access to all services
settings.deleteEffect4: This action is immediate and irreversible
settings.deleteError: Failed to delete account. Please try again.

error.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

faq_section.subtitle: You've got questions, we've got answers.

0.question: How secure is my loan data?
0.answer: Your loan data is protected with enterprise-grade encryption. We use secure servers and follow strict privacy protocols to ensure your financial information remains confidential and safe.

1.question: Can I track multiple loans?
1.answer: Yes! Our free plan allows you to track up to 5 loans, while our Pro plan offers unlimited loan tracking. Each loan can be customized with different payment schedules, interest rates, and categories.

2.question: How do I export my loan data?
2.answer: Pro users can easily export their loan data in CSV format. This feature is perfect for accounting purposes or creating backups. The exported file includes all loan details, payment history, and analytics.

3.question: Can I set payment reminders?
3.answer: Yes, you can set up email notifications for upcoming payments, due dates, and late payments. This helps you stay on top of your loan obligations and maintain a good payment record.

4.question: Is there a mobile app available?
4.answer: Currently, we offer a mobile-responsive web application that works great on all devices. We're actively working on native mobile apps for iOS and Android, coming soon!

5.question: What happens if I exceed the free plan limit?
5.answer: When you reach the 5-loan limit on the free plan, you'll need to upgrade to our Pro plan to add more loans. Don't worry - all your existing loan data will remain intact during the upgrade.

6.question: Can I calculate loan interest automatically?
6.answer: Yes! Our system automatically calculates interest based on your loan terms. We support various interest types including fixed, compound, and simple interest calculations.

7.question: How do I get support if I need help?
7.answer: We offer email support for all users. Pro plan users get priority support with faster response times. Our help center also contains detailed guides and tutorials.

8.question: Can I share loan details with others?
8.answer: Pro users can share loan details securely with other users, perfect for team collaboration or sharing with accountants. You control exactly what information is shared and with whom.

0.text: This loan management system has completely transformed how I handle my business loans. The automatic payment reminders are a lifesaver!
0.author: Rezhan sardar

1.text: I was struggling to keep track of multiple student loans, but this platform makes it so easy. The interest calculations are accurate and save me so much time.
1.author: Sam kilter

2.text: As a financial advisor, I recommend this platform to all my clients. The detailed analytics and reporting features are exactly what they need.
2.author: Michael Chen

3.text: The ability to track both personal and business loans in one place is fantastic. The dashboard is intuitive and the export feature is perfect for my accountant.
3.author: Lisa Thompson

0.caption: Smart Loan Tracking
0.title: Work smarter not harder
0.text: Say goodbye to spreadsheets and paper records. Our digital platform helps you track all your loans in one place, with automatic calculations and payment schedules that save you hours of work.

1.caption: Secure & Reliable
1.title: Your Financial Data, Protected
1.text: We take security seriously. Your loan data is protected with bank-grade encryption, regular backups, and strict access controls. Focus on your business while we keep your information safe.
